'''''Parma Eldalamberon 3''''' is the third issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|2|4}}

==Contents==
* Cover — Paula Marmor

* Columns
** "''Beth-Luis-Nion''" — Paula Marmor
** "Tales from the Little Old Bookmaker" — Jim Vibber
** "Learn now the Lore of Living Linguists" — Larry Krieg

* Book reviews
** ''[[A Glossary of the Eldarin Tongues]]'' by Jim Allan — reviewed by [[Robert Foster]]
** ''[[A Guide to Middle-earth]]'' by Robert Foster — reviewed by [[Jim Allan]]

* Articles
** "Science Fiction as a Test of Axioms concerning Human Behavior" — Kenneth L. Pike
** "The Queer Brandybuck Names" — Jim Allan
** "Notes toward a System of Sindarin Vowel Shifts" — Paula Marmor
** "On Pronouns in Quenya" — [[Bill Welden]]

* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* [[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 3 backcover.png|Back cover]] — Martha Krieg
